casebody.data:
SYKES, et al.
v.
BLUE CROSS AND BLUE SHIELD OF NORTH CAROLINA, et al. 248A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 25, 2018 Robert E. Fields, III, Attorney at Law, Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, William A. Blancato, GAL Appellate Attorney, Leon E. Porter, Attorney at Law, Ellis B. Drew, III, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Sykes, Susan, et al. Elizabeth L. Winters, Attorney at Law, Chad D. Hansen, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Adam H. Charnes, Attorney at Law, for Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina. D. Erik Albright, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cigna Healthcare of North Carolina, Inc. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Medcost LLC.

Jennifer K. Van Zant, Attorney at Law, Greensboro.

Benjamin R. Norman, Attorney at Law, Greensboro.

W. Michael Dowling, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of October 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of October 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 13th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
